737990.name: Friday the 13th: The Game - Jason Part 4 Pig Splitter Kill Pack
737990.description:
As of December 31st, 2023, this title will no longer be available for purchase. The game will continue to function through at least December 31, 2024 if it is already in your Library.

Experience three all new grab kills for Part 4 Jason Voorhees with his Pig Splitter. Three new kills include the 'Throat Slit,' 'Kneecapper,' as well as the 'Slam and Gut,' kill. All new kills exclusive to Part 4.

After installation you can select kills from the customization screen for Jason Part 4 either in your customization sub-menu or in-lobby. Assign each kill with the click of a button!
737990.supported_languages:
英语*, 法语, 意大利语, 德语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 日语, 俄语
*具有完全音频支持的语言
